Lillian Nakate Segujja (amụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1978) nke a na-akpọkarị Lillian Nakame, bụ onye injinia na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye omebe iwu na-anọchite anya Luweero District Women' Constituency na 10th Parliament (2016 ruo 2021).

A mụrụ ya na Wobulenzi, Luweero District, na Central Region nke Uganda, na 11 August 1978. Nne na nna ya bụ Francis Segujja na Annet Segujja. Ọ gara Wobulenzi Parents' School maka agụmakwụkwọ elementrị ya

Ọ gara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, gụnyere Saint John's Secondary School na Nandere, Luweero District, Mulusa Academy Secondary School, na Wobulenzi, na-agwụcha na Luteete Secondary School dị na Bamunanika, ebe ọ nọrọ ule O-Level ya
Ọ laghachiri na Mulusa Academy maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level ya.
Ọ debanyere aha na Uganda Polytechnic Kyambogo, nke mesịrị bụrụ akụkụ nke Mahadum Kyambogo
N'afọ 2007, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ukwuu na nke kachasị ochie na Uganda, na nzere Bachelor of Science (BSc) na Civil Engineering
Ọ sochiri nke ahụ na nzere Master of Science (MSc) n'otu mpaghara ahụ, n'otu mahadum ahụ, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2011
O nwekwara asambodo na Project Planning and Management, nke Institute of Statistics and Applied Economics na Mahadum Makerere nyere na 2008
E nyere ya asambodo na Financial and Business Management of Road Construction na 2013, site na Multitech Business School na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda.
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ede akwụkwọ na Kampala, ụlọ ọrụ Tectura International Planners, Architects and Project Managers, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ otu afọ, site na 2000 ruo 2001
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka injinia maka Luweero District Local Government maka afọ ise, site na 2001 ruo 2006
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye injinia obodo maka Wobulenzi Town Council, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ maka afọ anọ sochirinụ
N'oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'otu oge ahụ dị ka onye injinia distrikti maka Luweero District.
N'afọ 2011, ọ laghachiri na ngalaba onwe ya dị ka onye injinia bi maka Bestway General Contractors, ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ mba ụwa nwere ọrụ na Uganda
N'afọ 2012, ọ kwagara na Parrot 50 Uganda Limited, na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi na-ahụ maka injinia, ruo n'afọ 2016
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ civil engineer na UB Consulting Engineers Limited, ụlọ ọrụ injinia ọkachamara na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ.
N'afọ 2016, Nakate sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan site n'ịgba ọsọ maka Luweero District Women's Constituency, na National Resistance Movement

A họpụtara ya, merie Brenda Nabukenya nke Democratic Party (Uganda). Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri, Nakate bụ onye otu kọmitii ndị omeiwu na sayensị na teknụzụ ma bụrụ osote onyeisi oche nke kọmitii omeiwu na akụrụngwa anụ ahụ.
Lillian Nakate bụ nwanyị lụrụ di na nne nke atọ, gụnyere ejima, amụrụ n'ihe dị ka 2007 na nwanne, amụrụ otu afọ ka e mesịrị.
